alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 19 at 9:21PM EDT until June 21 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Florida... Ochlockonee River near Concord (CR 12) affecting Gadsden and Leon Counties. For the Ochlockonee River...including Thomasville (US 84), Concord (CR 12), Havana (US 27), Bloxham (SR 20), Smith Creek (CR 366)... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO WEDNESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Ochlockonee River near Concord (CR 12). * WHEN...From late tonight to Wednesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 36.0 feet, Primary access to homes along county highway 12 on the east bank of the river in Leon County may become restricted. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:45 PM EDT Monday the stage was 35.95 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 36.1 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow evening. - Flood stage is 36.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 36.2 feet on 01/08/2015. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning.
